text: election county commissioners grafton county removed amend rsa vi a to read as follows a grafton and hillsborough counties county county commissioner by those voters in each county commissioner district in each the county new subparagraph election grafton county commissioners amend rsa vi by inserting after subparagraph i the following new subparagraph j grafton county commissioner by the voters in each county commissioner district provided that at the state general election the commissioner from district shall be elected to a term the commissioner from district shall be elected to a term and the commissioner from district shall be elected to a term at each subsequent state general election commissioners shall be chosen in the county by the voters of the districts in which a commissioner s term is expiring and of the commissioners so chosen one shall serve a term and one shall serve a term and both shall hold their offices until their successors are chosen and qualified following the state general election the term shall be rotated in sequence starting with district
